events.message: I received my order last week, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's explanation and keywords.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah J., who specializes in refund scenarios to assist the customer further.
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I am here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund quickly, could you also let me know the reason for returning the product and its condition?
The order number is 123456789. The product arrived damaged and does not match the description on your website.
Thank you for that information. We will initiate a full refund for you and provide a prepaid return label for the damaged item.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and the prepaid label to return the item.
The refund process has been started and the return label has been emailed to you. Please return the item within 14 days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and to ask if you need any further assistance from us.
Yes, I received the return label and have already sent the package back. Thank you for your help!
The refund has been fully processed and your case is now closed. Please let us know if you need help in the future.
We have sent a short survey to collect your feedback on how we handled your refund request. Your input matters!
